src:
Senat Akademik Susutkan Bakal Calon Rektor ITB Jadi Enam Orang
01 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Catur Ratna Wulandari
BANDUNG, (PR).- Senat Akademik Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB) memilih enam bakal calon rektor sebelum memilih tiga Calon Rektor ITB 2020-2025.
Keenam bakal calon rektor itu ialah Benyamin Sapiie, Dwi Larso, Edy Tri Baskoro, Jaka Sembiring, Kadarsyah Suryadi, dan Reini D. Wirahadikusumah.Siaran pers Katua Panitia Adhoc Pemilihan Calon Rektor ITB 2020-2025 Jann Hidajat Tjakraatmadja mengatakan, keputusan tersebut diambil lewat sidang pleno tertutup pada Jumat, 1 November 2019. "Dengan agenda khusus pemilihan pemilihan enam Bakal Calon Rektor ITB 2020-2025," katanya lewat siaran pers, Jumat, 1 November 2019.Rapat pleno dimulai pukul 08.00, dibuka oleh Ketua Senat Akademik ITB Hermawan Kresno Dipojono. Rapat diikuti oleh 56 dari 59 anggota Senat Akademik ITB. Rapat berakhir pukul 10.00.Menurut informasi, hari ini pula Senat Akademik ITB akan menggelar rapat kembali untuk menentukan tiga Calon Rektor ITB. Rencananya, ketiga calon akan mengikuti ekspos publik di Kampus ITB pada Sabtu, 2 November 2019.*

Baca Juga
text:
Academic Senate Decreases ITB Rector Candidates to Six People
01 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Catur Ratna Wulandari
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Academic Senate of the Bandung Institute of Technology (ITB) selected six prospective chancellors before choosing three ITB Rector Candidates 2020-2025.
The six prospective chancellors are Benyamin Sapiie, Dwi Larso, Edy Tri Baskoro, Jaka Sembiring, Kadarsyah Suryadi, and Reini D. Wirahadikusumah. Press release by the Adhoc Committee for Election of ITB Candidates 2020-2025 Jann Hidajat Tjakraatmadja said, the decision was taken through a hearing session. The plenary was closed on Friday, November 1, 2019. "With the special election agenda for the six candidates for ITB Chancellor 2020-2025," he said in a press release, Friday, November 1, 2019. The plenary meeting began at 08.00, opened by the Chairman of the Academic Senate ITB Hermawan Kresno Dipojono. The meeting was attended by 56 of the 59 members of the ITB Academic Senate. The meeting ended at 10:00. According to information, today ITB Academic Senate will hold a meeting again to determine the three ITB Rector Candidates. The plan is for the three candidates to take part in public exposures at the ITB Campus on Saturday, November 2, 2019. *
